title: ITP facilitation van resolves driving license issues of APP staff
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 7 (APP):The Islamabad Traffic Police (ITP) Facilitation Van visited the Associated Press of Pakistan (APP) head office on Tuesday, addressing driving license-related matters of more than 100 employees on the spot.
A dedicated ITP team operated from 9 in the morning till 6:30 evening at the APP premises, offering renewal of driving licenses, issuance of learner permits, replacement of lost licenses, and resolution of other related matters promptly.
APP employees extended gratitude to Managing Director (MD) Muhammad Asim Khichi, Chief Traffic Officer Hamza Humayun and the ITP team for bringing licensing services to their doorstep.
They appreciated the initiative, noting that such outreach efforts provide significant ease to the journalist community.
The ITP team, in turn, commended APP employees for their enthusiasm toward obtaining valid licenses and adhering to traffic laws.
Staff members expressed hope that similar facilitation drives would continue, ensuring greater public convenience in the future.
